isContainer

public boolean isContainer()
Returns true if this component is a container. If component is a container, some method will also check its child components. Reduce the use of instanceof, because instanceof is a 'heavy' method.

                              int x,
                              int y,
                              int w,
                              int h)
When component customRendering is set to true, component rendering is done within this method. The implementation of this method provided by TComponent class does nothing.

createUI

protected void createUI()
Creates component UI, this method adjust the UI creation depends on component rendering technique.

There are three rendering technique : First, if this component is responsible of its own rendering (customRendering = true), the UI creation will be handled by createCustomUI(int, int) and processed by processCustomUI().

If not then it will checking the possibility of using external UI.

If all fail then this component will use its default Component UI Renderer.

See Also:
customRendering, createCustomUI(int, int), setExternalUI(BufferedImage[], boolean)

createRenderedUI

protected void createRenderedUI(int w,
                                int h)
Creates component UI by component UI Renderer.

processRenderedUI

protected void processRenderedUI()
Process component UI by component UI Renderer.

createCustomUI

protected void createCustomUI(int w,
                              int h)
When component customRendering is set to true, component UI is created in this method.

The implementation of this method provided by TComponent class does nothing.

processCustomUI

protected void processCustomUI()
Process component UI when component customRendering is set to true.

The implementation of this method provided by TComponent class does nothing.

processExternalUI

protected void processExternalUI()
External UI that needed further process is processed within this method, by default external UI is processed by component UI Renderer.

validateUI

public void validateUI()

public void printUIResource()
